source.badTag: a tag that shouldn't be here !!

names.fullName: Force sensing by mechanical extension of the Src family kinase substrate p130Cas.

attributeList.attribute: Sawada Y., Tamada M., Dubin-Thaler BJ., Cherniavskaya O., Sakai R., Tanaka S., Sheetz MP.
NC-biotinylated CasSD was either stretched or not on latex membrane and then incubated with recombinant kinase and analyzed for phosphorylation.
I wrote to the contact author who supplied me with the Invitrogen product numbers for the recombinant kinases. These were expressed in insect cells, however, the cell type is not specified.

names.fullName: FYN oncogene related to SRC, FGR, YES
Phosphorylation of CasSD by c-Src increases with stretching

attributeList.attribute: The level of phosphorylation of CasSD by c-Src increased as strectching of CasSD increased.

The recombinant c-Src protein used was purchased from Invitrogen (product no. P3044; GenBank Accession Number: NP_005148.2)and was expressed in insect cells. It has an extra LEACQLGTDDYDIPTTHHHHHH at the C-terminus compared to the UniprotKb sequence.
CasSD was phosphorylated at Tyr-460 and sites recognized by the pCas-165 and pCas-410.

names.fullName: Phosphorylation of CasSD by Abl1 is dependent on stretching

attributeList.attribute: Phosphorylation of CasSD by Abl1 was only observed when there was stretching of CasSD.

The recombinant Abl1 used was purchased from Invitrogen (product no. P3049; GenBank Accession Number: NP_005148.2) and was expressed in insect cells. The sequence of the recombinant Abl1 protein used has the sequence LEACQLGTDDYDIPTTHHHHHH extra at the C-terminus as compared with the UniprotKb sequence.

names.fullName: Phosphorylation of CasSD by FynT is dependent on stretching

attributeList.attribute: Phosphorylation of CasSD by FynT was only observed when there was stretching of CasSD.

The recombinant FynT used was purchased from Invitrogen (product no. P3042; GenBank Accession Number: NP_694592) and was expressed in insect cells. The sequence of the recombinant FYN protein used has the sequence LEACQLGTDDYDIPTTHHHHHH extra at the C-terminus as compared with the UniprotKb sequence.
